frontmatter.title: Staking as a service
frontmatter.description: An overview of how to get started with pooled ETH staking
summaryPoints: Third-party node operators handle the operation of your validator client
Great option for anyone with 32 ETH who doesn't feel comfortable dealing with the technical complexity of running a node
Reduce trust, and maintain custody of your withdrawal keys
frontmatter.alt: Leslie the rhino floating in the clouds.

items.title: What is staking as a service? {#what-is-staking-as-a-service}
